name: MIDIObjectAddRemoveNotification
desc: A message that describes the addition or removal of an object.

items.name: var parent: MIDIObjectRef
items.desc: The parent object of the added or removed child.

items.name: var child: MIDIObjectRef
items.desc: The added or removed child object.

items.name: init(messageID: MIDINotificationMessageID, messageSize: UInt32, parent: MIDIObjectRef, parentType: MIDIObjectType, child: MIDIObjectRef, childType: MIDIObjectType)
